post.author: Cipher
post.body:
I am wondering if there is any technical info. on any significant changes to the engine for Prey, aside from the portal aspects.

Namely I am interested in the particle / effects system. But sadly, I cannot find any info. on this area.

Did Human Head base Prey off of the Doom 3 version of Tech 4 or did they base if off of Quake 4 ? Or some kind of hybrid ?

post.author: Kamikazee
post.body: I believe they took Doom 3 and started tucking on stuff from there. I don't know what changes there are though.

post.author: Cipher
post.body: Ah well thanks Kamikaze, might have to look deep into the SDK
